text: This is a blog post about the Amazon Prime Video series "The Power," which tells the story of women around the world who suddenly gain the ability to electrocute others and transfer that power through touch, leading to a reversal of gender roles. The post includes information about the cast and crew, as well as links to download the show from various sources, including torrent magnets. It also encourages readers to follow the public account "影的后花园" (Ying de Hou Huan Yuan) or ID "BluFilm" on WeChat for more content related to movies and TV shows.
